snippet: The French Internet provider Free is supplying its customers with software that will automatically block Internet advertising, the life blood of companies like Google.
abstract: French Internet provider Free enables software that allows its 5.2 million subscribers to automatically block Internet advertising; move has raised alarm among companies like Google that base their entire business models on free content based on ad revenue.
lead_paragraph: The French Internet provider Free is supplying its customers with software that will automatically block Internet advertising, the life blood of companies like Google.

headline.main: Ad Blocking Raises Alarm Among Firms Like Google
headline.print_headline: Ad Blocking in France Sets Off an Online Battle
